name: Ibis Nuernberg Altstadt

reviews.text: This was not a good place to stay in the summer. There is no A/C, yet if you open the windows, you have nothing blocking the noise of an extremely busy Kebab restaurant on the ground floor under the hotel, people yelling in all languages throughout the night (weeknights included - usually till about 3 am) - and worse was the horrible smell from the meat!! It was unbearable.
reviews.title: Don't stay here in July

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you aren't there in the summer, you will like this hotel - great location near the train station yet on the main road into town - 5 min walk. The room was huge by European standards, bed comfy, nice bathroom, HUGE breakfast buffet. I ate so much each day I didn't eat lunch. Meats, cheeses, pastries, many types of bread, fruit, delicious yogurt, cereals, eggs, vegetables, yum!!!
reviews.title: Great Location

likes.liked: — Location to railway station and center of city.
likes.disliked: — Nothing, typical IBIS hotel, nothing to dislike about it.

reviews.title: Great hotel!
reviews.text: Recommend staying here as long as it's not during July or August.

description: Located 150 m from the railway station and 7 km from the airport, the Ibis Nüernberg Altstadt hotel is located in the heart of the old city. Book one of our 53 rooms, all with Wifi Internet access. The hotel also features a bar, a 24 hr snack service andundercover public pay parking. The centre of Nuremberg is 800 m away. The Meistersingerhalle cultural and convention centre is 4 km away, and the Opernhaus is 200 m from the hotel. The Nuremberg Arena is 4 km away. Pets accepted.
